resources.string: Do not turn the screen on between the hours below
You will be now taken to the notification settings. If you wish to stop Screen Notifications, simply turn it off.

Clicking ok will take you to the notification settings. For this app to work you will need to turn on Screen Notifications. Android will warn you that the app may capture your private data, Screen Notifications never reads the content of notifications.
Enable to turn on Screen Notifications
Enable to allow shorter screen timeouts
Enable and disable apps to turn the screen on for notifications. Apps that create a notification for the first time will automatically turn the screen on.
sender del whaatspp si es muy largo deberia ponerlo aqui in pasarse de la raaa
ejemplo de u whastapp que recibamos de varias lineas a ver que hace la criatura. Apps that create a notification for the first time will automatically turn the screen on.
